data.actual_result: It shows the normal friends list headings and not the Wumpus picture
data.expected_result: There should be a Wumpus image such as "You can't unblock the Wumpus"
data.short_description: The Wumpus images in the friends lists do not show if you don't have blocked friends or don't have friend requests
data.steps_to_repro: - Ensure that your pending friends list or blocked friends list is empty - Go to the empty pending/blocked friend list
